item.title: Jamie Bennett, CBS and Walt Disney TV Executive, Dies at 78
item.description: Jamie Bennett, a television executive at CBS and Walt Disney who developed shows including “Live With Regis and Kathie Lee,” died July 6 of cancer. He was 78. Bennett worked with CBS for 1
